attributes.action: To stop the abuse of personal information by introducing tougher laws urgently.
attributes.additional_details:
Businesses in the UK require protection from others abusing/linking to their websites without their prior knowledge or permission.
It causes vast distress when individuals cannot contact those abusing their information. When contacted, they do not respond even if the information is incorrect, out of date or misleading or can extend the abuse both inside and outside the UK. Info. must be checked every 6 months.
It is the responsibility of government to protect its citizens and businesses in the UK.
attributes.background: Individual Permission must be sought & information checked for accuracy. Currently government departments, businesses, SEOs, etc. process and sell personal information indiscriminately without checking for accuracy regardless whether the individual is severely disabled, elderly, a child or deceased
